channel.title: music on Just a Memo
channel.description: Recent content in music on Just a Memo

item.title: Video
item.description: Video Combine Combine multiple flvs into one emerge -avq mplayer mencoder -forceidx -of lavf -oac pcm -ovc copy -o film.flv 1.flv 2.flv 3.flv 4.flv 5.flv 6.flv 7.flv 8.flv 9.flv Spit One mp4 into multiple mp4 ffmpeg -i 5大運動傷害搶先知.mp4 -c copy -map 0 -segment_time 00:01:30 -f segment -f segment output%03d.mp4 Split videos and music file into chunks * 可
